info.name: RentCast API Endpoints
info.description:
This collection contains all endpoints for retrieving property records, property valuations, real estate listings, and market data using the RentCast property data API.

## Getting Started

We use API keys to authenticate all requests to our API and to track your API usage and billing.

If you haven't done so already, follow this guide to create a RentCast account, activate your API subscription, and generate an API key:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/getting-started-guide](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/getting-started-guide)

#### Adding Your API Key to PostMan

Once you've generated an API key, you have two options for adding it to PostMan:

1. **Using collection variables (default)**: open the [Variables](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/collection/34259606-4b4532c7-3e0f-4a51-a019-438a3d68b4c3?tab=variables) tab of this collection and enter your API key as the current value of the `api_key` variable
2. **Using environment variables**: alternatively, you can use the [Development](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/environment/34259606-dd8c731a-feea-4625-b546-8e769699b389) or [Production](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/environment/34259606-334cc5c3-472a-41a6-90be-86bb2882a03a) environments to manage your API keys with the `api_key` environment variable. When using this option, select an environment at the top right, and modify the [Authorization](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/collection/34259606-4b4532c7-3e0f-4a51-a019-438a3d68b4c3?tab=authorization) header value in this collection to use the environment `api_key` variable
    

Once you've added your API key to PostMan using one of the two options above, all API requests will automatically send it to our server in the `X-Api-Key` header.

## Available Data Sets

The following is a list of data sets that we provide for retrieving property data:

- [Property data](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-7a95fcca-5c07-49d8-9d33-3d2013e4e49b): retrieve property attributes, features, property tax data, and property owner information for residential and commercial properties in the US
- [Property valuation](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-5930b665-c298-402a-a11c-2c91723a5671): retrieve property value and rent estimates (AVM) for residential and commercial properties in the US, as well as sales and rental comparables
- [Property listings](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-0d104a49-535a-44f5-bf66-f75ab8c8b030): retrieve active and historical sale and rental listings in the US
- [Market data](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-a31b6303-8148-4eee-ab13-f8a79f08a0dd): retrieve aggregate rental listing data, averages, listing statistics, and historical rent trends for US zip codes
    

## Guides and More Information

You can view detailed guides on using our API, learn more about our data sources and coverage, and view a full reference of our available endpoints on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/introduction](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/introduction)

This includes tips on how to structure your [search queries](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/search-queries), how to retrieve data in bulk using [pagination](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination), the [types of properties](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types) we support, as well as our [rate limits](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/rate-limits) and [response codes](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/response-codes).

## Help and Support

Our dedicated support team is available 7 days a week to answer your questions and provide help with your integration via live chat or email.

You can contact us by launching the live chat at the bottom right of our [developer portal](https://developers.rentcast.io), or by sending an email to [support@rentcast.io](https://mailto:support@rentcast.io).

query.description: (String) The **full address** of the property, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for properties in a specific area
(String) The name of the city, used to search for properties in a specific city. This parameter is case-sensitive

(String) The 5-digit zip code, used to search for properties in a specific zip code
(Float) The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

(Float) The number of bedrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout
(Float) The number of bathrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms
(Integer) The maximum number of property records to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

(Integer) The index of the first property record to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

item.description:
Our `/properties` endpoints allow you to retrieve data for over 140 million properties in the United States, covering most residential and commercial properties in the country.

## Available Endpoints

We provide the following endpoints for retrieving property data and records:

- [/properties](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-a1e1ab91-c4af-4816-822e-71f37390a269): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve a group of property records matching specific criteria, or a single property record for a specific address
- [/properties/random](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-ad59f325-62a2-4382-bfc0-087f41e44428): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve up to 500 property records selected at random, to facilitate testing or use cases that require a random sampling of property data
- [/properties/:id](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-fb5d3973-affa-429c-aca3-217aba456764): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve a specific property record, given its internal id. The id can be retrieved using the other `/properties`, [/avm](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-5930b665-c298-402a-a11c-2c91723a5671) or [/listings](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-0d104a49-535a-44f5-bf66-f75ab8c8b030) endpoints, or cached in your application from prior requests
    

## Learn More

You can learn more about our property data sources, update frequency, supported queries, and pagination on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-data](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-data)

View the full documentation for this endpoint on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/rent-estimate-long-term](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/rent-estimate-long-term)

response.name: Get Rent Estimate by Address

url.raw: https://api.rentcast.io/v1/avm/rent/long-term?address=5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244&propertyType=Single Family&bedrooms=4&bathrooms=2&squareFootage=1600&compCount=5

query.value: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244
query.description: (String) The **full address** of the property, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
(Float) The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter
(Float) The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter
(String) The type of the property. See [explanation of property types](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types)
(Float) The number of bedrooms in the property. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout
(Float) The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms
(Float) The total living area size of the property, in square feet
(Float) The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in miles
(Integer) The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1
(Integer) The number of comparable listings to use when calculating the rent estimate, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 15 if not provided

item.description:
The `/avm` endpoints allow you to retrieve real-time property value and rent estimates for most residential and commercial properties in the United States.

You can also use our `/avm` endpoints to retrieve sales and rental comparables to display them in your applications, or calculate your own property value and rent estimates.

## Available Endpoints

We provide the following endpoints for retrieving property value and rent estimates:

- [/avm/value](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-e002e7ad-0694-45f8-8009-caa228061d5a): an endpoint for retrieving current property value estimates, which represent the current market value, or after-repair value (ARV), of a given property. It also returns a list of comparable sale listings for that property
- [/avm/rent/long-term](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-797902b6-f22a-42ae-b912-ad47166dc3a8): an endpoint for retrieving current long-term property rent estimates for a given property. It also returns a list of comparable rental listings for that property
    

## Learn More

You can learn more about our property valuation methodology, data sources, and accuracy on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-valuation](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-valuation)

item.name: Property Listings

query.description: (String) The **full address** of the property, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for listings in a specific area
(String) The name of the city, used to search for listings in a specific city. This parameter is case-sensitive
(String) The 2-character state abbreviation, used to search for listings in a specific state. This parameter is case-sensitive
(String) The 5-digit zip code, used to search for listings in a specific zip code
(Float) The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area
(Float) The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area
(Float) The radius of the search area in miles, with a maximum of 100. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for listings in a specific area
(String) The type of the property, used to search for listings matching this criteria. See [explanation of property types](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types)
(Float) The number of bedrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout
(Float) The number of bathrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms
(String) The current listing status, used to search for listings matching this criteria
(Integer) The maximum number of days since a property was listed on the market, with a minimum of 1
(Integer) The maximum number of listings to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

(Integer) The index of the first listing to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

item.description:
The `/listings` endpoints allow you to search for and retrieve active and inactive sale and rental listings in all 50 US states.

Sale listings refer to properties listed for sale, while rental listings refer to properties listed for rent.

## Available Endpoints

We provide the following endpoints for retrieving sale and rental listings:

- [/listings/sale](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-c7b379b2-7d5b-443a-8661-cc36cadf7d19): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve sale listings matching specific criteria in a given city or state, or in a particular geographical area
- [/listings/sale/:id](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-d079fb30-7dfb-47c2-8d51-8339eb661fbf): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve a specific sale listing, given its internal id. The id can be retrieved using the [/properties](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-7a95fcca-5c07-49d8-9d33-3d2013e4e49b), [/avm](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-5930b665-c298-402a-a11c-2c91723a5671) or other `/listings` endpoints, or cached in your application from prior requests
- [/listings/rental/long-term](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-e0db5624-e797-44c4-ba70-a9e28ee53df1): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve rental listings matching specific criteria in a given city or state, or in a particular geographical area
- [/listings/rental/long-term/:id](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-b66d3109-2c54-4bd4-990d-2039701250ac): an endpoint that allows you to retrieve a specific rental listing, given its internal id. The id can be retrieved using the [/properties](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-7a95fcca-5c07-49d8-9d33-3d2013e4e49b), [/avm](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/folder/34259606-5930b665-c298-402a-a11c-2c91723a5671) or other `/listings` endpoints, or cached in your application from prior requests
    

## Learn More

You can learn more about our property listings sources, update frequency, supported queries, and pagination on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-listings](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-listings)

query.description: (String, Required) A valid 5-digit US zip code

item.description:
The `/markets` endpoint allows you to retrieve aggregate rental listing data, averages, listing statistics, and historical rent trends for most zip codes in the United States.

## Available Endpoints

We provide a single endpoint for retrieving rental market data - [/markets](https://www.postman.com/rentcast/workspace/rentcast-api/request/34259606-9f62d566-85d7-4f86-b187-7497b5498036). It will return all of the aggregate and historical data we have available for a given zip code.

## Learn More

You can learn more about our market data sources and update frequency on our API developer portal:

[https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/market-data](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/market-data)
